author: tagape#3232
install_msg: Thank you for installing my CnovelTags cog. Type `[p]help Cnoveltags` for more information.
name: Cnoveltags
short: Convert common fandom nicknames to Ao3 marked pinyin
description: This cog will convert common fandom nicknames for famous Cnovel and Danmei characters into Ao3's format, which you can then easily paste into Ao3's Character or Relationship tags boxes.
